articles.title: Fujifilm announces Duvo HZK24-300mm portable mount zoom lens in India - Times of India
articles.description: Fujifilm has launched the Fujinon Duvo HZK24-300mm portable PL mount zoom lens in India. This lens is part of the Duvo series and offers a 12.5x zoom

articles.title: Ubon J1 Magic audio sunglasses launched at Rs 1,999 - Check features - Zee Business
articles.description: Ubon J1 smart Audio sunglasses are priced at Rs 1,999 and are available in two colour options - grey and black. They come with a warranty of 6 months.
